snippet: A rainout for the Yankees at Kansas City on Monday means Tanaka will not start as planned Tuesday against Seattle’s Hisashi Iwakuma, because Manager Joe Girardi is pushing his entire rotation back.
lead_paragraph: A rainout for the Yankees at Kansas City on Monday means Tanaka will not start as planned Tuesday against Seattle’s Hisashi Iwakuma, because Manager Joe Girardi is pushing his entire rotation back.

headline.main: Tanaka’s Matchup Against Ex-Teammate Falls Through
headline.print_headline: Tanaka’s Matchup Against Ex-Teammate Falls Through
